title: I Survived 100 Days as a PIGLIN in Hardcore Minecraft... Minecraft Hardcore 100 Days

Minecraft hardcore 100 days is the traditional idea, but i survived 100 days a piglin shapeshifter. I also modified the game to spawn more types of enchanted books in the nether.
